Address.label: Address
Address.value: 8100 DENMARK ROAD, CHARLOTTE, North Carolina, 28273-5975, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Cato Corp operates as a specialty retailer of fashion apparel and accessories primarily in the southeastern United States. Its primary objective is to be the fashion specialty retailer for fashion and value in its markets. The company operates through the following business segments: Retail and Credit. The Retail segment which generates majority revenue offers fashion specialty stores. The Credit segment involves credit card services.
